pr_title: Optimize return values in Upsert operation

timeline.message: Optimise return values in upsert request
Optimise return values in upsert request

timeline.bodyText: ShardUpsertRequest.Item should have equals/hashcode because the superclass has it as well, so i regenerated it for ShardUpsertRequest to be consistent and get rid of import com.google.common.base.Objects.
timeline.author: mkleen
